statements: SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked;
SELECT student_id, module_id, level FROM levels_unlocked WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked WHERE level = 3;
SELECT student_id, unlocked_date FROM levels_unlocked ORDER BY unlocked_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked WHERE module_id = 2 ORDER BY student_id ASC, level DESC;
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked WHERE student_id = 1 AND module_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, module_id, MAX(level) AS highest_level FROM levels_unlocked GROUP BY student_id, module_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT module_id) AS total_modules_unlocked FROM levels_unlocked GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked WHERE unlocked_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY student_id ASC, module_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM levels_unlocked WHERE level BETWEEN 2 AND 5 AND unlocked_date >= '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked
SELECT student_id, module_id, level_number FROM levels_unlocked
SELECT module_name FROM modules
SELECT module_id, module_name FROM modules
SELECT student_id, module_id, level_number FROM levels_unlocked ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT module_name, level_number FROM levels_unlocked INNER JOIN modules ON levels_unlocked.module_id = modules.module_id
SELECT module_name, COUNT(*) FROM levels_unlocked INNER JOIN modules ON levels_unlocked.module_id = modules.module_id GROUP BY module_name
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked WHERE level_number > 5 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT module_name FROM levels_unlocked INNER JOIN modules ON levels_unlocked.module_id = modules.module_id
SELECT * FROM Levels;
SELECT level_name, points_required FROM Levels WHERE points_required > 50;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM Students WHERE current_level_id = 3;
SELECT module_name FROM Modules WHERE level_unlocked = 1 ORDER BY module_id DESC;
SELECT level_id, level_name, module_id FROM Levels JOIN Modules ON Levels.module_id = Modules.module_id;
SELECT * FROM Levels WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM Students WHERE progress < 0.5;
SELECT module_name, level_unlocked FROM Modules ORDER BY level_unlocked DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, current_level_id FROM Students WHERE current_level_id = 3;
SELECT level_name, module_id FROM Levels WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked;
SELECT student_id, module_id, level_number, unlocked_at FROM levels_unlocked ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT module_id, module_name FROM modules WHERE module_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM students JOIN progress_history ON students.student_id = progress_history.student_id;
SELECT student_id, module_id, level_number, completed_at FROM progress_history WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked ORDER BY unlocked_at ASC
SELECT student_name, module_name FROM students JOIN modules ON students.student_id = modules.module_id
SELECT student_id, module_name, level_number FROM levels_unlocked WHERE level_number > 10
SELECT * FROM progress_history WHERE completed_at > '2022-01-01' AND level_number < 5
SELECT student_name, module_description FROM students JOIN modules ON students.student_id = modules.module_id
SELECT * FROM levels_unlocked;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM modules;
SELECT student_id, module_id, score FROM scores;
SELECT student_id, module_id, completed FROM progress;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM modules WHERE module_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_id, module_id, level_unlocked FROM levels_unlocked ORDER BY level_unlocked DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM scores GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_score > 80;
